short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension allows you to quickly add image files and URLs to your Saganworks account.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Effortlessly add images or whole URLs to Saganworks. Add titles and descriptions for your knowledge, then add search terms to quickly find things when you need them in the Saganworks app. You can also search your knowledge and view various file-types right in your browser.
